cause.description:
By donating a minimal $20-50 you can send an orphan in Zambia to school for one year. The expenses cover clothes and a meal each day for teh child. Help to save the younger generations from suffering the same fate as their parents and make their futures bright!
1. Education should be universal.
2. End the plight of AIDS.
3. Give children an equal chance.
cause.name: Cecily's Fund
